control.visible: [Container.Content(Movies) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,movie) | Container.Content(Sets) | Container.Content(TVShows) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,tvshow) | Container.Content(Seasons) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,season) | Container.Content(Episodes) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,episode) | Container.Content(MusicVideos) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,musicvideo) | Window.IsVisible(VideoPlaylist)] + ![String.StartsWith(Container.FolderPath,plugin://plugin.video) + Container.Content(Episodes) + String.IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(tvshow.poster))]
